original_text: Howbeit the high places were not taken away: for as yet the people had not prepared their hearts unto the God of their fathers.
korean_text: 산당만은 철거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 마음을 정하여 그들의 조상들의 하나님께로 돌아오지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit the high places were not taken away:
for as yet the people had not prepared their hearts
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아직 백성들이 그들의 마음을 준비하지 않았기 때문이니

sentences.original_text: unto the God of their fathers.
